Class DrawableObject

java.lang.Object
domain.DrawableObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
Subscribeable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Clickable, DroppableArea, Player, SupremaSquare
public abstract class DrawableObject extends Object implements Subscribeable

      public final void setParent(DrawableObject parent)
      sets parent for object
      Parameters:
      parent - new parent for object - must not be null if you want object to have no parent, use resetParent() method
      See Also:
      • resetParent()

    • resetParent

      public final void resetParent()
      sets object to global space, which means it wouldn't have any parent no more takes no action if object is already at the global scope
